description: Pass 2 clinical entity extraction quality and performance metrics. This table tracks metrics for the Pass 2 AI processing pipeline including entity counts, confidence scores, bridge schema usage, token consumption, and processing costs.
clinical_context: This is a SYSTEM-GENERATED metrics table, NOT extracted from medical documents. It tracks the performance and quality of the Pass 2 clinical entity extraction process. The AI processing system populates this table automatically after completing Pass 2 extraction.

profile_id.guidance: References user_profiles(id) ON DELETE CASCADE. Cross-pass join key for aggregation.

shell_file_id.guidance: References shell_files(id) ON DELETE CASCADE. Tracks which document was processed.

processing_session_id.guidance: References ai_processing_sessions(id) ON DELETE CASCADE. PRIMARY cross-pass join key for rollup analytics.

clinical_entities_enriched.description: Count of clinical entities extracted in Pass 2
clinical_entities_enriched.guidance: Total number of clinical entities extracted (conditions, medications, observations, etc.). Must be non-negative.

schemas_populated.description: Array of table names populated during Pass 2 extraction
schemas_populated.guidance: PostgreSQL TEXT[] array. Must use EXACT table names from database (e.g., 'patient_medications', not 'medications'). NOT NULL - must have at least one table name.

clinical_model_used.description: AI model name and version used for extraction
clinical_model_used.guidance: Model identifier string including version if available. Required for cost attribution and quality analysis.

average_clinical_confidence.description: Average AI confidence across all Pass 2 extractions
average_clinical_confidence.guidance: NUMERIC(4,3) - 0.000-1.000 range with 3 decimal places. Calculated as mean of all entity ai_confidence scores.

manual_review_triggered_count.description: Count of entities flagged for manual review
manual_review_triggered_count.guidance: Count of entities where requires_review=true. Defaults to 0. Non-negative integer.

validation_failures.description: Count of validation failures during extraction
validation_failures.guidance: Count of entities that failed schema validation. Defaults to 0. Non-negative integer.

bridge_schemas_used.description: Array of bridge schema names used during extraction
bridge_schemas_used.guidance: PostgreSQL TEXT[] array. Use bridge schema identifiers (e.g., 'patient_medications_detailed' or 'patient_medications_minimal'). Consider GIN index for analytics.

schema_loading_time_ms.description: Time to load bridge schemas in milliseconds
schema_loading_time_ms.guidance: INTEGER type. Measures bridge schema loading performance. Non-negative.

clinical_tokens_used.description: Total tokens consumed during Pass 2 extraction
clinical_tokens_used.guidance: INTEGER type. Sum of input + output tokens. Required for cost calculation. Non-negative.

processing_time_ms.guidance: INTEGER type. End-to-end Pass 2 processing duration. Required for performance analysis. Non-negative.

cost_usd.guidance: NUMERIC(8,4) - up to $9,999.9999 with 4 decimal places. Calculated from tokens_used and model pricing. Non-negative.

user_agent.description: User agent string from processing request
user_agent.guidance: Optional metadata for debugging and analytics.

ip_address.guidance: PostgreSQL INET type. Supports both IPv4 and IPv6. Optional metadata for security and analytics.

examples.description: Successful Pass 2 extraction with high confidence
Processing with validation issues and lower confidence

extraction_guidelines.system_generated: This table is populated AUTOMATICALLY by the AI processing system after Pass 2 completion. It is NOT extracted from medical documents.
extraction_guidelines.required_fields_strict: All 8 required fields (profile_id, shell_file_id, processing_session_id, clinical_entities_enriched, schemas_populated, clinical_model_used, clinical_tokens_used, processing_time_ms) must be provided.
extraction_guidelines.schemas_populated_naming: Must use EXACT database table names (e.g., 'patient_medications', NOT 'medications'). Case-sensitive.
extraction_guidelines.bridge_schemas_naming: Must use bridge schema identifiers with tier suffix (e.g., 'patient_medications_detailed' or 'patient_medications_minimal').
extraction_guidelines.cross_pass_consistency: Use consistent field names and precisions across Pass 1, Pass 2, and Pass 3 metrics tables for aggregation.
extraction_guidelines.processing_session_id_key: PRIMARY join key for cross-pass analytics. All passes share the same processing_session_id for a given pipeline run.
extraction_guidelines.cost_calculation: cost_usd calculated from clinical_tokens_used Ã— model_price_per_token. Precision allows costs up to $9,999.9999.

quality_indicators.low_quality: average_clinical_confidence < 0.700 OR validation_failures > 2 OR manual_review_triggered_count > clinical_entities_enriched * 0.5

extraction_guidelines.performance_optimization: Consider GIN indexes on schemas_populated and bridge_schemas_used arrays for analytics queries filtering by table names.

interoperability_notes.pass1_pass3_parity: Mirror this contract in Pass 1 and Pass 3 metrics tables. Use consistent keys (profile_id, shell_file_id, processing_session_id) and datatypes.
interoperability_notes.naming_alignment: Pass 1: 'entities_detected', Pass 2: 'clinical_entities_enriched', Pass 3: 'narratives_generated'. Consider adding common 'entities_count' field.
interoperability_notes.session_hierarchy: processing_session_id is cross-pass join key. If separate sessions per pass, add pipeline_run_id for rollups.
interoperability_notes.summary_layer: Create materialized view aggregating across passes per processing_session_id and per profile_id (total counts, durations, tokens, cost, avg confidences).
interoperability_notes.analytics_indexes: GIN indexes on TEXT[] arrays enable efficient filtering: CREATE INDEX idx_schemas_populated ON pass2_clinical_metrics USING GIN(schemas_populated);

validation_rules.schemas_populated: Must be valid TEXT[] array with at least one exact table name (NOT NULL)
validation_rules.average_clinical_confidence: If provided, must be between 0.000 and 1.000 with 3 decimal places
validation_rules.manual_review_triggered_count: If provided, must be non-negative integer
validation_rules.validation_failures: If provided, must be non-negative integer
validation_rules.bridge_schemas_used: If provided, must be valid TEXT[] array with bridge schema identifiers
validation_rules.schema_loading_time_ms: If provided, must be non-negative integer
validation_rules.cost_usd: If provided, must be non-negative number with max 4 decimal places
validation_rules.ip_address: If provided, must be valid IPv4 or IPv6 format
